description: General stats dashboard with node selector, uses metrics from wmi_exporter

panels.description: * windows_logical_disk_split_ios_total The number of I/Os to the disk were split into multiple I/Os (LogicalDisk.SplitIOPerSec)
panels.title: Hard disk i/o ops total

panels.description: * windows_logical_disk_write_latency_seconds_total Shows the average time, in seconds, of a write operation to the disk (LogicalDisk.AvgDiskSecPerWrite)
panels.title: Hard disk latency

title: Windows Node
